item.title: Here's what happens when private equity buys homes in your neighborhood
item.description: What makes rents go down and neighborhood diversity go up? Corporate landlords. But they also make it harder to own for yourself.

item.title: SCOTUS lifts limits on LA raids. And, Nation's Report Card shows drops in scores
item.description: The Supreme Court on Monday issued an order clearing the way for agents to resume aggressive immigration sweeps in LA. And, a new Nation's Report Card shows drops in science, math and reading scores.

item.title: Trump's Medicaid cuts will hurt children's hospitals
item.description: The GOP said its overhaul of Medicaid was aimed at reducing fraud and getting more adult beneficiaries to work. Among the likely side effects: fewer services and doctors for treating sick children.

item.title: A new Nation's Report Card shows drops in science, math and reading scores
item.description: It's the first Nation's Report Card since the Trump administration began making cuts to the U.S. Education Department. The scores reflect the state of student achievement in early 2024.

item.title: Rupert Murdoch buys out 3 of his children to seal fate of his media empire
item.description: The owner of Fox News, the Wall Street Journal and dozens of other media properties has settled a legal fight with three of his own children over who would control his companies after his death.

item.title: Palestinian gunmen kill 6 in Jerusalem as U.S. offers new Gaza ceasefire proposal
